summary: Based on a true story, this compelling drama relates the difficulties of a young woman married to a Japanese diplomat during World War II, victim of suspicion and animosity from her husband's government.
cast: Carroll Baker|James Shigeta|James Yagi|Tetsurô Tanba|Yôko Takahashi|Hiroshi Tomono|Yoshiko Hiromura|Sean Garrison|Ruth Masters|Lee Payant|Nori Elisabeth Hermann|Emi Florence Hirsch
title: Puente al sol
